title: 8 Bedroom House in Sector 21A, Faridabad
description:
Check out this spacious 8 bhk independent house for sale in sector 21a, faridabada well-Established residential locality with strong end-User demand.

Built on a super built-Up area of approx. 4,500 sq.Ft., this freehold property is 510 years old and available for immediate possession. The home is thoughtfully planned with two identical floors, each offering a 4 bhk layout plus a dedicated office/study room, making it ideal for large families, multi-Generation living, or those needing work-From-Home space.

Key highlights

Configuration: 8 bedrooms | 7 bathrooms | 2 balconies

Layout: Two identical floors (Each 4 bhk + office/study room)

Servant accommodation: Three separate servant quarters, each with an attached toilet and kitchen, planned for independent use (One per floor)

Ownership: Freehold

Possession: Immediate

Price: Inr 12 crore

A rare opportunity to own a large, well-Laid-Out independent home in a prime faridabad location.

**brokers/agents please do not call. Direct buyers only**

title: 4 BHK Flat in Sector 21A, Faridabad
description:
This house is located in one of the most posh areas of faridabad, surrounded by a premium environment, lush greenery, and free from pollution. Situated in a fully secured, gated society, the floor plan is beautifully designed with four spacious bedrooms each with its own attached bathroom along with a large drawing room and lobby.

In addition to the four bedrooms, there is a separate mandir room (Photos attached). The house features a large corner balcony attached to the drawing room and front bedroom, as well as a smaller balcony attached to one of the other bedrooms. All rooms have windows for ventilation, with the front room featuring a large window that adds a premium touch to the space.

One of the highlights of the home is the modern modular open kitchen. It includes a well-Designed common slab that serves perfectly as a breakfast counter, giving the space a big, open, and luxurious kitchen vibe truly bringing out the best chef in you.

The house has been recently renovated, including the installation of modern false ceilings throughout, even in the bathrooms, adding both style and value. It is west-Facing, ensuring ample sunlight perfect for natural lighting and drying clothes.

Youll get two permanent car parking spaces inside the home (Documented), and all essential amenities are managed by home services with no extra charge. Just 300 meters away is a well-Maintained, clean park maintained by the society. The lane is also secured by a dedicated guard, providing an added layer of security.

Additionally, one of the city's largest hospitals is located within the same block. All major online services like zepto, swiggy, and blinkit are available here, and shops, gyms, and chemist stores most offering home delivery are conveniently nearby. All of this makes it one of the best areas to live in.
